page.title: 11CALMORE MIDDLE SCHOOL.
page.content: 1Calmore Middle School was opened on 4th Sept 1974.It is one of two Middle schools in Totton.The school is now 11 yrs old.The number of children has increased from 97 to 329.There are 21 full and part time teachers, including 4 perapatetic music teachers.School starts at 8.35am and finishes at 3.20pm.There are two breaks at 10.30 and 12 o'clock.The boys school uniform is dark and light blue tie,grey trousers and white,grey or blue shirts.The girls wear white or blue blouses and blue skirts and the school tie.For lunch you either have sandwhiches, dinners or go home.There are various activities at Calmore like volleyball and netball.There is a Lower school which consists of years 9 and 10 and an Upper school which consists of years 11 and 12.
